blogPost.excerpt: Headlime’s Artificial Intelligence helps you write your articles, no matter what language they need to be in. Write with confidence knowing that every word is guaranteed to sound great and grammar-error-free.
blogPost.body: Headlime’s Artificial Intelligence helps you write your articles, no matter what language they need to be in. Write with confidence knowing that every word is guaranteed to sound great and grammar-error-free.
blogPost.title: Blog Assistant by Headlime - GPT3-powered blog editor that cures writer's block.
blogPost.author: Danny Postma

localize.description: Headlime的人工智能帮助您撰写文章，无论文章需要用什么语言。充满信心地写作，知道每一个字都保证听起来很棒，没有语法错误。
localize.tagline: GPT3驱动的博客编辑器，治疗作家的障碍。

localize.description: Headlime的人工智能幫助您撰寫文章，無論文章需要用什麼語言。充滿信心地寫作，知道每一個字都保證聽起來很棒，沒有語法錯誤。
localize.tagline: GPT3驅動的博客編輯器，治療作家的障礙。

previous.excerpt: Alinea is a mobile investing app for the next generation. We match you to stocks based on your interests and offer bite-sized insights so you can invest in the companies you believe in. Join the waitlist to reserve a spot!
previous.title: Alinea - Invest in stocks you believe in

localize.description: Alinea是一款面向下一代的移动投资应用。我们根据您的兴趣为您匹配股票，并提供比特大小的见解，让您可以投资您相信的公司。加入候补名单，预约名额!
Alinea是一款面向下一代的移動投資應用。我們根據您的興趣爲您匹配股票，並提供比特大小的見解，讓您可以投資您相信的公司。加入候補名單，預約名額!

next.title: The CS Code Program - Become a Computer Science Engineer in 12 months.

localize.description: CS.code.in是一个硬核的，密集的，绝对沉浸式的计算机工程轨道，具有BS+MS大学课程的所有正确成分，减去年限和数十万美元。
localize.tagline: 在12个月内成为一名计算机科学工程师。

localize.description: CS.code.in是一個硬核的，密集的，絕對沉浸式的計算機工程軌道，具有BS+MS大學課程的所有正確成分，減去年限和數十萬美元。
